title: Stream: Little Lungs – Rebuild
content:
Of the thousands of new artists I’ve listened to over the past twelve months, Chicago songstress Little Lungs is certainly up there in terms of potential to cross over from blog-popular to mainstream success. With her delicate vocals and as equally fragile composition, there’s a really intoxicating aurora to her music, that’s deeply personal yet still accessible.

New EP Rebuild almost appears to be documenting the post-relationship haze; the acceptance, the moving on and the burning flares that point towards the future. With her Lana Del Rey / Nancy Sinatra drawl and simplistic yet haunting synth sections, the likes of A Moment of Overwhelming Grief and EP closer Rebuild showcase the under-produced pop that she does so well. Without meaning to sound condescending, nor taking anything away from her talent, with a greater production budget, there’s no telling where Little Lungs could end up. Check out the full EP below, and download it for free.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
